abstract: Andy Chen, chief executive of Aspiro, the parent company of the Swedish streaming music service Tidal, has stepped down, and about a dozen employees were laid off.
snippet: Andy Chen, chief executive of Aspiro, the parent company of the Swedish streaming music service Tidal, has stepped down, and about a dozen employees were laid off.
lead_paragraph: Barely a month after Jay Z took over Tidal, a Swedish streaming music service, the top executive at its parent company has stepped down and about a dozen employees have been laid off.

headline.main: Chief Leaves Music Service Taken Over by Jay Z
headline.print_headline: Chief Leaves Music Service Taken Over by Jay Z
